review_text: An emotionally touching story, John Green captures the essence of love and loss.
Magical and enchanting, J.K. Rowling's world-building is unparalleled.
Stephen King's 'IT' is a gripping horror masterpiece that will haunt your dreams.
Haruki Murakami's 'Norwegian Wood' is a beautifully melancholic journey.
Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's 'Half of a Yellow Sun' is a powerful portrayal of war.
Jane Austen's 'Pride and Prejudice' remains a timeless classic.
Gabriel García Márquez weaves a mesmerizing tapestry of magical realism in 'One Hundred Years of Solitude'.
Margaret Atwood's 'The Handmaid's Tale' is a thought-provoking dystopian masterpiece.
George Orwell's '1984' is a chilling warning about the dangers of totalitarianism.
Agatha Christie's 'Murder on the Orient Express' is a brilliant whodunit.
Ernest Hemingway's 'The Old Man and the Sea' is a testament to the indomitable human spirit.
Maya Angelou's 'I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings' is a poignant memoir of resilience.
Toni Morrison's 'Beloved' is a haunting exploration of the legacy of slavery.
J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' is a delightful adventure in Middle-earth.
Leo Tolstoy's 'War and Peace' is an epic masterpiece of Russian literature.
Alice Walker's 'The Color Purple' is a powerful narrative of strength and sisterhood.
Kazuo Ishiguro's 'Never Let Me Go' is a poignant and heartbreaking dystopian tale.
Herman Melville's 'Moby-Dick' is a literary classic that delves into the depths of obsession.
Virginia Woolf's 'Mrs. Dalloway' is a stream-of-consciousness masterpiece.
Mark Twain's 'The Adventures of Tom Sawyer' is a delightful journey into the world of a mischievous boy.
J.D. Salinger's 'The Catcher in the Rye' captures the angst of adolescence with authenticity.
Harper Lee's 'To Kill a Mockingbird' is a timeless exploration of racial injustice.
Aldous Huxley's 'Brave New World' is a dystopian vision of a controlled society.
F. Scott Fitzgerald's 'The Great Gatsby' is a compelling critique of the American Dream.
Emily Brontë's 'Wuthering Heights' is a dark and passionate tale of love and revenge.
